(Requires attunement)

This ring is linked to the Elemental Plane of Water.

While wearing this ring, you have advantage on attack rolls against @UUID[Compendium.sw5e.monsters.Actor.namJz755U1EhvEJa]{Water Elemental}s, and they have disadvantage on attack rolls against you. In addition, you have access to properties based on the linked plane.

The ring has 5 charges. It regains 1d4 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. Powers cast from the ring have a save DC of 17.

Ring of Water Elemental Command. You can expend 2 of the ring's charges to cast @UUID[Compendium.sw5e.powers.Item.eEpy1ONlXumKS1mp]{Dominate Monster} on a Water Elemental. In addition, you can stand on and walk across liquid surfaces as if they were solid ground. You can also speak and understand Aquan.

If you help slay a Water Elemental while attuned to the ring, you gain access to the following additional properties:

  • You can breathe underwater and have a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.
  • You can cast the following powers from the ring, expending the necessary number of charges: @UUID[Compendium.sw5e.powers.Item.a3XtAO5n2GrqiAh5]{Create or Destroy Water} (1 charge), @UUID[Compendium.sw5e.powers.Item.7fFHlBk3UNX8gPKL]{Control Water} (3 charges), @UUID[Compendium.sw5e.powers.Item.WN2LWEljYU6QqnRH]{Ice Storm} (2 charges), or @UUID[Compendium.sw5e.powers.Item.fzZnVKLmBMo2f5up]{Wall of Ice} (3 charges).
